greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: 0 unless n is a composite number A002808(k) when a(n) = k.
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Module[{k=1},Table[If[CompositeQ[n],k;k++,0],{n,100}]] (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 03 2019 *)
program: x (i, z, cs'@(c:cs)) | i == c = Just (z, (i + 1, z + 1, cs))
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 09 2001
